textBox.richText: Valérie is leaving Idiap. Although she was not part of the research team, strictly speaking, as she was one of our program manager at Idiap, I think she deserved an entry in this blog as an acknowledgement. Indeed, over these 4 years she performed a remarkable work and was a great support during both the preparation and running of our projects (MOBIO, TABULA RASA and more recently BEAT). Valérie thank you again for all that. We will miss your dynamism. All the best and see you soon.
